title: Kotak Mahindra bank | SDE2 | Bangalore
content:
Education: M. Tech. in CS from TIER 1 college
Years of Experience: 3+
Previous salary: Approx 80+lpa (24L base+ 170K USD stocks vesting quaterly).
Date of the Offer: Jan 2024
Company: Kotak Mahindra bank
Title/Level: SDE2
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 35L (30L + 20L cash bonus vesting 25% per year)
Signing Bonus: None
Stock bonus: None
Variable Bonus: Upto 3L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 38L per year
Benefits: Work from home offered

Gave interview for fun and practice. I'm already very satisfied with my current job.

title: BlackRock | Associate | Gurgaon | Offer
content:
Education: B.E in CS
Years of Experience: ~4 years 9 months
Current Comp: ~15L +bonus
Date of the Offer: April 2024
Company: BlackRock
Title/Level: Associate
Location: Gurgaon
Salary: 23.4L
Bonus: 2.8L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Retirals + Well Being): ~28.35L
Benefits: Free food, cab, unlimited time off
Other details: No competing offers

title: Microsoft | L61 | offer
content:
Education: Tier 2 college
Years of Experience: 4
Current Experience: Service based 
Current Compensation: 13L (fixed) + 1L variable

Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: SDE 2 (L61)
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 25 L (fixed)
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 3.9 L
Stock bonus: 40K USD
Bonus: Performance based

Company: Avalara
Title/Level: SSE
Location: Pune
Salary: 28 L (fixed)
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 3.9 L
Bonus: 2.8

Please suggest which one should I join?
